mapper.select: SELECT (T6.MPY_BSDT || (CASE WHEN T6.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN '' WHEN T6.DP_TP_CD = '0203' THEN '카' END)) AS MPY_BSDT /* 이체 */ , T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD /* 채권업무구분코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'BND_BIZ_DV_CD', T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD) AS BND_BIZ_DV_NM /* 채권업무구분명 */ , T4.PD_CLSF_NM /* 제품군 */ , T3.PD_NM /* 제품명 */ , T3.PD_CD /* 제품코드 */ , T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T1.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , T1.CST_NO /* 고객코드 */ , T1.CST_NM AS CST_KNM /* 고객명 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_MCN, 0) AS DLQ_MCN /* 연체개월 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS OJ_AMT /* 대상금액 = 총연체금(연체금액 + 연체가산금) + 당월청구 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0) AS OJ_DP_AMT /* 대상입금 = 총연체입금(연체입금금액 + 연체가산금입금금액) + 당월요금입금금액 */ , (NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0)) - (NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0)) AS OJ_BLAM /* 대상잔액 = 대상금액 - 대상입금 */ , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND TT1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.AUTH_RSG_CNFM_YN = 'Y') > 0 THEN (SELECT AUTH_RSG_CNFMDT FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND TT1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND TT1.BASE_YM = (SELECT MAX(BASE_YM) FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT2 WHERE TT2.CNTR_NO = TT1.CNTR_NO AND TT2.CNTR_SN = TT1.CNTR_SN) AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.AUTH_RSG_CNFM_YN = 'Y') WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND TT1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.AUTH_RSG_EXP_YN = 'Y') > 0 THEN (SELECT AUTH_RSG_DUEDT FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND TT1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND TT1.BASE_YM = (SELECT MAX(BASE_YM) FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ TT2 WHERE TT2.CNTR_NO = TT1.CNTR_NO AND TT2.CNTR_SN = TT1.CNTR_SN) AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.AUTH_RSG_EXP_YN = 'Y') END AS AUTH_RSG_CNFMDT /* 직권해지일자 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 ON T3.PD_CD = T2.BASE_PD_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS T4 ON T4.PD_CLSF_ID = T3.PD_MCLSF_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.AUTH_RSG_CNFM_YN = 'Y' AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN LATERAL( SELECT CASE WHEN TT2.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN MPY_BSDT WHEN TT2.DP_TP_CD = '0203' THEN MPY_BSDT||'카' WHEN TT2.DP_TP_CD = '0401' THEN '지로' ELSE '기타' END FNT_MTHD , TT1.DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , TT1.DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , TT2.CST_NO , TT2.MPY_BSDT , TT2.DP_TP_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL TT1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS TT2 ON TT2.CNTR_STLM_ID = TT1.CNTR_STLM_ID AND TT2.CNTR_NO = TT1.DTL_CNTR_NO AND TT2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND TT1.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY VL_END_DTM DESC, CNTR_STLM_REL_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) T6 ON 1=1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = (SELECT BASE_YM FROM (SELECT BASE_YM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNSL_BAS_IZ WHERE BND_CNTR_TP_CD = '01' ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

/*웰스 동일고객 입금내역 그리드 * cntrNo : W20168068982-멤버십 W20223541076-렌탈 cntrSn : 1*/ SELECT T1.PERF_YM /*실적월*/ , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.RENTAL_TN, 0)) --판매유형이 렌탈/리스 일경우 렌탈차월 WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.RN, 0)) || ' (' || SUBSTR(T1.PERF_YM,0,4) || '/' || SUBSTR(T1.PERF_YM,5,2) || ')' --판매유형이 멤버십 일경우 경과차월(년월) ELSE TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.RN, 0)) --그외 경과 차월만 END RENTAL_TN /*차월*/ , CASE WHEN (SELECT DISTINCT TT1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS TT1 WHERE TT1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND TT1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) = 'L21' THEN NVL(T2.THM_BIL_OC_AMT,0) --리스일경우 당월 청구금액 ELSE NVL(T2.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0) --매출합계금액 END AS THM_SL_SUM_AMT /*매출금액*/ , NVL(T4.DP_AMT,0) - NVL(T5.DP_AMT,0) AS DP_AMT_FNL /*입금액*/ , NVL(T2.PRM_DP_AMT, 0) - NVL(T2.PRM_RFND_AMT, 0) AS PRM_AMT /*영업선수금액*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.UC_AMT, 0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말미수금 WHEN T3.BND_BIZ_DV_CD LIKE 'L3%' THEN NVL(T3.DLQ_AMT, 0) --멤버십 일 경우 해당월에 연체금액 WHEN NVL(T3.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) > 0 THEN NVL(T3.UC_AMT, 0) --위약금이 있을경우 해당월 미수금 WHEN T3.DLQ_MCN > 1 THEN NVL(T6.UC_AMT, 0) --연체개월이 1보다 클경우 기말미수금 ELSE NVL(T3.DLQ_AMT,0) --그외 연체금액 END AS DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.UC_AMT, 0) + NVL(T2.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말미수금+매출금액 WHEN T3.BND_BIZ_DV_CD LIKE 'L3%' THEN NVL(T3.UC_AMT, 0) --멤버십 일 경우 해당월에 미수금 ELSE NVL(T2.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0) + NVL(T3.UC_AMT, 0) END AS UC_AMT /*미수금액*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.UC_AMT, 0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말미수금 WHEN NVL(T3.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) > 0 THEN NVL(T3.UC_AMT, 0) --위약금이 있을경우 해당월 미수금 WHEN T3.DLQ_MCN > 1 THEN NVL(T6.UC_AMT, 0) --연체개월이 1보다 클경우 기말미수금 ELSE NVL(T3.DLQ_AMT,0) --그외 연체금액 END AS BIL_UC_AMT /*청구미수금액*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.DLQ_MCN, 0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말연체개월 ELSE NVL(T3.DLQ_MCN,0) END AS DLQ_MCN1 /*연체개월*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.DLQ_ADD_AMT,0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말연체가산금액 ELSE NVL(T3.DLQ_ADD_AMT,0) END AS DLQ_ADD_AMT1 /*연체가산금*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(T6.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT,0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말연체가산입금금액 ELSE NVL(T3.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT,0) END AS DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT1 /*연체가산입금*/ , CASE WHEN T1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL((T6.DLQ_ADD_AMT - T6.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT),0) --실적년월이 당월일경우 기말연체가산잔액 ELSE NVL((T3.DLQ_ADD_AMT - T3.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT),0) END AS DLQ_ADD_BLAM1 /*연체가산잔액*/ , NVL(T6.DLQ_MCN,0) AS DLQ_MCN2 /*연체개월 - 일시불*/ , NVL(T6.DLQ_AMT,0) AS DLQ_AMT_L10 /*연체금액 - 일시불*/ , NVL(T6.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_DP_AMT_L10 /*연체입금금액 - 일시불*/ , CASE WHEN (NVL(T6.DLQ_AMT,0) - NVL(T6.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0)) > 0 THEN (NVL(T6.DLQ_AMT,0) - NVL(T6.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0)) ELSE 0 END AS THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT_L10 /*당월입금금액 - 일시불*/ FROM ( SELECT PERF_YM, RN FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(SL_CL_YM) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ELSE MIN(SL_CL_YM) END SL_CL_YM FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}), 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL-1), 'YYYYMM') AS PERF_YM , ROWNUM AS RN FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN( TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1), 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYYMM'), TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(SL_CL_YM) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ELSE MIN(SL_CL_YM) END SL_CL_YM FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn})), 'YYYYMM') ) ) ORDER BY RN DESC ) T1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 ON T2.SL_CL_YM = T1.PERF_YM AND T2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*WELLS매출월마감*/ LEFT JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.PERF_YM, 'YYYYMM'),1) ,'YYYYMM') AND T3.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN /*채권계약기본*/ LEFT JOIN ( /*수납상세 입금*/ SELECT CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SUBSTR(PERF_DT,0,6) AS RVE_YM, SUM(RVE_AMT) AS DP_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SUBSTR(PERF_DT,0,6) ) T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T4.RVE_YM = T2.SL_CL_YM LEFT JOIN ( /*수납상세 환불*/ SELECT CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SUBSTR(PERF_DT,0,6) AS RVE_YM, SUM(RVE_AMT) AS DP_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('2', '4') AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SUBSTR(PERF_DT,0,6) ) T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T5.RVE_YM = T2.SL_CL_YM LEFT JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T6 ON T6.BASE_YM = T1.PERF_YM AND T6.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T6.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN /*채권계약기본*/ ORDER BY PERF_YM DESC

SELECT NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS OJ_AMT /* 대상금액 = 총연체입금(연체입금금액 + 연체가산금입금금액) + 당월요금액 */ , NVL(T1.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RSG_BOR_AMT /* 위약금 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS TOT_DLQ_AMT /* 총연체금액 */ , NVL(T2.SL_AGG_AMT, 0) + NVL(T2.THM_SL_SUM_AMT, 0) AS SL_AGG_AMT /* 매출누계 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0) AS OJ_DP_AMT /* 대상입금 = 총연체입금(연체입금금액 + 연체가산금입금금액) + 당월요금액 */ , NVL(T3.LS_RNTF, 0) AS LS_RNTF /* 분실료 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) AS TOT_DLQ_DP_AMT /* 총연체입금 */ , NVL(T4.DP_AGG_AMT, 0) - NVL(T5.RFND_AGG_AMT,0) AS DP_AGG_AMT /* 입금누계 */ , (NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0)) - (NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0)) AS OJ_BLAM /* 대상잔액 = 대상금액 - 대상입금 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_MCN, 0) AS DLQ_MCN /* 연체개월 */ , (NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0)) - (NVL(T1.DLQ_DP_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0)) AS TOT_DLQ_BLAM /* 총연체잔액 = 총연체금액 - 총연체입금 */ , NVL(T2.DSC_AGG_AMT, 0) AS DSC_AGG_AMT /* 할인누계 */ , NVL(T1.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 월요금액 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_ADD_AMT /* 연체가산금액 */ , NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(SL_CTR_AMT, 0)) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO), 0) AS CTR_AGG_AMT /* 조정누계 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(RVE_AMT),0) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TT1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') THEN NVL(TT1.RVE_AMT, 0) * -1 ELSE NVL(TT1.RVE_AMT, 0) END AS RVE_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL TT1 WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND SUBSTR(RVE_DT,1,6) = T1.BASE_YM AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('02','03','04','05','07','08','19','13','18','97') )) AS UC_DP_AMT /* 미수입금 */ , NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0) AS MM_CHRAM_DP_AMT /* 월요금입금 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT /* 연체가산입금 */ , NVL(T1.UC_AMT, 0) - (SELECT NVL(SUM(RVE_AMT),0) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TT1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') THEN NVL(TT1.RVE_AMT, 0) * -1 ELSE NVL(TT1.RVE_AMT, 0) END AS RVE_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL TT1 WHERE 1=1 AND TT1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND SUBSTR(RVE_DT,1,6) = T1.BASE_YM AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('02','03','04','05','07','08','19','13','18','97') )) AS UC_BLAM /* 미수잔액 = 미수금액 - 미수입금 */ , NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) - NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT, 0) AS MM_CHRAM_BLAM /* 월요금잔액 = 당월요금금액 - 당월요금입금금액*/ , NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) - NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_ADD_BLAM /* 연체가산잔액 = 연체가산금액 - 연체가산금입금금액 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 ON T2.SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS T3 ON T3.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(RVE_AMT) AS DP_AGG_AMT , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN ) T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(RVE_AMT) AS RFND_AGG_AMT , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN ) T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = (SELECT BASE_YM FROM (SELECT BASE_YM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNSL_BAS_IZ WHERE BND_CNTR_TP_CD = '01' ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = #{bndBizDvCd} AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT NVL(T2.BOR_AMT, 0) AS BOR_AMT /* 위약금총액 */ , NVL(T2.DP_CCAM_SUM_AMT, 0) AS DP_CCAM_SUM_AMT /* 입금위약금합계금액 */ , NVL(T2.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0) AS BOR_BLAM /* 위약잔액 */ , NVL(T3.THM_SL_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_SL_SUM_AMT /* 당월매출합계금액 */ , NVL(T4.DP_AGG_AMT, 0) - NVL(T6.RFND_AGG_AMT, 0) AS ACU_DP_AMT /* 누적입금금액 */ , NVL(T1.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , NVL(T1.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RSG_BOR_AMT /* 해지위약금액 */ , NVL(T2.RGST_COST_DSC_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RGST_COST_DSC_BOR_AMT /* 등록비할인위약금액 */ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT /* 렌탈할인위약금액 */ , NVL(T2.CSMB_COST_BOR_AMT, 0) AS CSMB_COST_BOR_AMT /* 소모품비위약금액 */ , NVL(T5.P_BOR_AMT, 0) AS P_BOR_AMT /* 포인트위약금액 */ , NVL(T5.REQD_CS_BOR_AMT, 0) AS REQD_CS_BOR_AMT /* 철거비용위약금액 */ , NVL(T5.LS_RNTF, 0) AS LS_RNTF /* 분실손료 */ , NVL(T5.RSTL_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RSTL_BOR_AMT /* 재약정위약금액 */ , T7.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD AS CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /* 현재계약상세상태코드 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS T2 ON T2.PERF_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T3 ON T3.SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(RVE_AMT) AS DP_AGG_AMT , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN ) T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_WELLS_AUTH_RSG_IZ T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.AUTH_RSG_CNFM_YN = 'Y' AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(RVE_AMT) AS RFND_AGG_AMT , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN ) T6 ON T6.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T6.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T7 ON T7.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = (SELECT BASE_YM FROM (SELECT BASE_YM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNSL_BAS_IZ WHERE BND_CNTR_TP_CD = '01' ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = #{bndBizDvCd} AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT NVL(T2.RENTAL_RGST_COST, 0) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST /*등록비용*/ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_AMT, 0) AS RENTAL_AMT /*렌탈료1월요금*/ , T3.DUTY_USE_MCN /*렌탈료의무기간(일)*/ , T4.STPL_PTRM /*의무기간(개월) - 유상멤버십*/ , T2.REQD_DTM /*철거요청일자*/ , NVL(T4.CNTRAM_DSC_AMT, 0) AS RGST_DSC /*등록비할인*/ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_DSC_AMT, 0) AS RENTAL_DSC_AMT /*렌탈료1할인*/ , T4.SELL_DSC_DV_CD /*할인구분코드*/ , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '1' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SPAY_DSC_DV_CD', T4.SELL_DSC_DV_CD) WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RENTAL_DSC_DV_CD', T4.SELL_DSC_DV_CD) WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MSH_DSC_DV_CD', T4.SELL_DSC_DV_CD) END SELL_DSC_DV_NM /*할인구분명*/ , T2.CAN_DT /*취소일자 - 탈퇴일자*/ , T4.CNTR_PD_ENDDT /*계약상품종료일자*/ , NVL(T2.CNTR_TAM, 0) AS CNTR_TAM /*렌탈총액*/ , T4.SELL_DSC_TP_CD /*할인유형*/ , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RENTAL_DSC_TP_CD', T4.SELL_DSC_TP_CD) WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MSH_DSC_TP_CD', T4.SELL_DSC_TP_CD) END AS SELL_DSC_TP_NM /* 할인유형명 */ , T2.SELL_TP_CD /*리스구분*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'BND_BIZ_DV_CD', T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM /*리스구분명*/ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_AMT2, 0) AS RENTAL_AMT2 /*렌탈료2월요금*/ , NVL(T2.SV_PRD, 0) AS SV_PRD /*관리주기(개월)*/ , (SELECT OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL /*계약관계*/ WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AND CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위*/ AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '215' /*계약관계*/) AS LINK_DTL_CNTR_NO /*1+1연계계약*/ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_DSC_AMT2, 0) AS RENTAL_DSC_AMT2 /*렌탈료2할인*/ (SELECT OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL /*계약관계*/ WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AND CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위*/ AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' /*계약관계*/) AS SDING_DTL_CNTR_NO /*모종계약*/ , (SELECT OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO ||'-'|| OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL /*계약관계*/ WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN AND CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' /*계약단위*/ AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '22L' /*계약관계*/) AS ALNC_LINK_DTL_CNTR_NO /*제휴연계계약*/ , NVL(T2.CNTR_PTRM, 0) AS RENTAL_PTRM /*렌탈료1개월*/ , NVL(T2.RENTAL_PTRM2, 0) AS RENTAL_PTRM2 /*렌탈료2개월*/ , SUBSTR(T4.CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,8) AS SL_RCOG_DT /*매출일자*/ , NVL(T4.SELL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_AMT /*월회비 - 판매금액*/ , NVL(T4.SV_PRD, 0) AS SV_PRD2 /*서비스주기 - 관리주기*/ , NVL(T4.DSC_AMT, 0) AS DSC_AMT /*할인금액*/ , T4.SPP_DUEDT /*방문일자*/ , T2.CNTR_DT /*가입일자*/ , T5.VST_NMN_N /*방문차월*/ , T6.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N /*무상멤버십*/ , NVL(T4.CNTR_AMT, 0) AS CNTR_AMT /*인수금 - 청약금*/ , T4.ISTM_MCN /*할부개월*/ , T6.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N /*무상A/S*/ , NVL(T4.FNL_AMT, 0) AS FNL_AMT /*계약총액*/ , NVL(T4.ISTM_PCAM_AMT, 0) AS ISTM_PCAM_AMT /*할부금액*/ , NVL(T4.MM_ISTM_AMT, 0) AS MM_ISTM_AMT /*월할부금*/ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 /*채권계약기본내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 /*WELLS매출월마감내역*/ ON TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM,'YYYYMM'),-1), 'YYYYMM') = T2.SL_CL_YM AND T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_RENTAL_ADN_SV_IZ T3 /*렌탈부가서비스내역*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T4 /*계약상세*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TT1.CNTR_NO,TT1.CNTR_SN ORDER BY TT1.WK_SN DESC) AS RN , TT1.CNTR_NO , TT1.CNTR_SN , VST_NMN_N -- 방문차월 , VST_DUEDT -- 방문예정일자 , VST_DV_CD -- 방문/택배 구분 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TT1 ) WHERE RN = 1 /*고객번호,계약번호,계약일련번호 당 한건만*/ ) T5 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T6 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T6.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T6.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = (SELECT BASE_YM FROM (SELECT BASE_YM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNSL_BAS_IZ WHERE BND_CNTR_TP_CD = '01' ORDER BY BASE_YM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = #{bndBizDvCd} AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT TB1.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RVE_DT ASC) AS RN /* 번호 */ , T1.RVE_NO /* 입금번호 */ , T1.RVE_DT /* 수납일자 */ , T1.PERF_DT /* 실적일자 */ , T1.RVE_CD /* 수납코드 */ , (SELECT RVE_NM FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_CD WHERE KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND RVE_CD = T1.RVE_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS RVE_NM /* 수납명 */ , T1.DP_DV_CD /* 입금구분코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_DV_CD', T1.DP_DV_CD) AS DP_DV_NM /* 입금구분명 */ , T3.SELL_TP_CD /* 입금종류코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T3.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM /* 입금종류명 */ , T1.DP_TP_CD /* 입금유형코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_TP_CD', T1.DP_TP_CD) AS DP_TP_NM /* 입금유형명 */ , (SELECT SUM(RVE_AMT) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL WHERE RVE_NO = T1.RVE_NO AND CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND RVE_DV_CD IN ('02','03','04','05','07','08','19','13','14','18','97')) AS RVE_AMT /* 수납금액 */ , T1.DP_MES_CD /* 입금수단코드 */ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_MES_CD', T1.DP_MES_CD) WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE FNIT_CD = T2.CRDCD_FNIT_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ELSE '' END AS DP_MES_NM /* 카드구분 */ , T1.RVE_DV_CD /* 수납구분코드 */ , CASE WHEN T1.RVE_DV_CD = '01' THEN '청약/인수' WHEN T1.RVE_DV_CD = '03' THEN '할부입금' WHEN T1.RVE_DV_CD = '98' THEN '기타선수' ELSE '' END AS RVE_DV_NM /* 일시불 - 업무구분 */ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T2 ON T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T2.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('02','03','04','05','07','08','19','13','14','18','97') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY T1.RVE_DT DESC ) TB1 ORDER BY RVE_DT DESC
